characters: Driver of a white sedan, two individuals on a red tricycle
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving steadily. A red tricycle with two individuals, one wearing an orange shirt and the other in a red shirt, is seen on the left side of the road. The tricycle gradually moves to the right side of the road, eventually stopping.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position, keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicle does not need to take any evasive actions as the tricycle moves to the right side of the road and stops.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 30 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Left side: A red tricycle with two individuals, approximately 10 meters away, moving to the right side of the road and stopping.
